explanation: [0-0] Steve is standing in front of a blackboard in a classroom with an orange floor. On the blackboard, there is a three-dimensional figure composed of four rectangles. Steve is holding a black pointer, pointing at the figure.

Then, the scene changes to Steve standing in front of the blackboard nodding. There is a cloud-shaped pattern on the left with the number "4" on it. There are two circles on the right side of the pattern. Steve nods forward.
